mapper.select: SELECT evnt_num, evnt_title, evnt_content, to_char(evnt_rgstdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as evnt_rgstdate, to_char(evnt_enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as evnt_enddate, evnt_views,to_char(evnt_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as evnt_startdate, to_char(evnt_modifydate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as evnt_modifydate, evnt_filef, evnt_files, evnt_filet, evnt_thumb FROM event
